# flipped(along:)

**Instance Method**

Returns the pose flipped along the specified axis.

## Declaration

```swift
func flipped(along axis: Axis3D) -> Pose3DFloat
```

## Parameters

- **axis**: The axis of the flip operation.
title: flipped(along:)
